title: Installing solar lighting in Malawi Africa

tasks.task: Assembling and installing a solar panel system for battery charging and lighting.
subtasks: Connecting solar panels to the battery using crocodile clips.
Attaching multiple bulbs (two bulbs) to the charged battery.
Ensuring proper color (red) connections for the battery terminals.
Testing the brightness and functionality of the connected bulbs.
Positioning the solar panel on the roof to capture sunlight for charging.
Confirming the system's ease of use and positive reception by intended users.
